mapper.select: SELECT boardno, title, content, regiId AS regiId, regiDate, readcnt, loginLoginNo, isNotice AS isNotice, categoryboard_categoryId AS categoryId, subCategoryId FROM board ORDER BY isNotice DESC, regiDate DESC

SELECT b.boardno, b.isNotice, b.title, b.content, b.regiId, b.regiDate, b.readcnt, b.loginLoginNo, b.categoryboard_categoryId AS categoryId, b.subCategoryId, cb.name AS categoryName, b.imagePath, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT c.commentId), 0) AS commentCount, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT hb.heartId), 0) AS heartCount FROM board b LEFT JOIN commentboard c ON b.boardno = c.boardno LEFT JOIN categoryboard cb ON b.categoryboard_categoryId = cb.categoryId LEFT JOIN heartsboard hb ON b.boardno = hb.boardno
AND b.categoryboard_categoryId = #{categoryId}
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY b.boardno, b.isNotice, b.title, b.content, b.regiId, b.regiDate, b.readcnt, b.loginLoginNo, b.categoryboard_categoryId, b.subCategoryId ORDER BY b.isNotice DESC,
b.regiDate DESC
b.readcnt DESC
commentCount DESC
b.boardno DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT boardno, isNotice, title, content, regiId, regiDate, readcnt, loginLoginNo, categoryboard_categoryId, subCategoryId, FROM board WHERE categoryboard_categoryId = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY isNotice DESC, boardno DESC

SELECT DISTINCT b.boardno, b.title, b.content, b.regiId, b.regiDate, b.readcnt, b.loginLoginNo AS loginLoginNo, b.categoryboard_categoryId AS categoryId, b.subCategoryId, p.name AS categoryName, c.name AS subCategoryName, COALESCE(hc.heartCount, 0) AS heartCount, CASE WHEN hb.loginNo IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS liked, l.loginNo AS loginNo, b.imagePath FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boardno, COUNT(*) AS heartCount FROM heartsboard GROUP BY boardno ) hc ON b.boardno = hc.boardno LEFT JOIN categoryboard p ON b.categoryboard_categoryId = p.categoryId LEFT JOIN categoryboard c ON b.subCategoryId = c.categoryId LEFT JOIN login l ON b.loginLoginNo = l.loginNo LEFT JOIN heartsboard hb ON hb.boardno = b.boardno AND hb.loginNo = #{loginNo} WHERE b.boardno = #{boardno} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET readcnt = readcnt + 1 WHERE boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, content, regiId, regiDate, loginLoginNo, categoryboard_categoryId, subCategoryId, imagePath, isNotice ) SELECT #{title}, #{content}, l.name AS regiId, NOW(), l.loginNo, #{categoryId}, #{subCategoryId}, #{imagePath}, CASE WHEN l.role = 2 THEN #{isNotice} ELSE 0 END FROM login l WHERE l.loginNo = #{loginLoginNo};
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.title, b.content, b.regiId, b.regiDate, b.readcnt, b.loginLoginNo AS loginLoginNo, b.categoryboard_categoryId AS categoryId, b.subCategoryId, COALESCE(COUNT(h.heartId), 0) AS heartCount FROM board b LEFT JOIN heartsboard h ON b.boardNo = h.boardNo GROUP BY b.boardNo HAVING heartCount >= 3 ORDER BY b.regiDate DESC
